title: Fort Point Studio Apt
posting_body: Fort Point Studio apartment with rooftop deck w/ BBQ, garage parking ($450/month), on-site maintenance + management.
Unit comes with W/D in unit.
• Brand new, huge, floor-to-ceiling custom closets in each bedroom including ample, built-in shelving and storage.
• Both bathrooms are ensuite - walk right into them from your bedroom.
• Trader Joe's Grocery store 1 block away.
• No parking included (i.e., parking garage available $450/month OR neighborhood permit street parking only)
• Unit will come furnished OR unfurnished.
• Short walking distance to Harborwalk around Seaport district, local shops restaurants, entertainment in Seaport.
